import{motion}from"framer-motion";import React from"react";import logo from'../../img/SillyCoder.png';//setup the variables
import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var token_type="empty";var access_token="empty";var url="http://sillycode.tech/dashboard";function Dashboard(){window.addEventListener('load',load);var loginclick=function loginclick(){if(window.location.href.toString()!=url){window.location.href=url;}else{window.location.href="https://discord.com/api/oauth2/authorize?client_id=1043950277738385499&redirect_uri=http%3A%2F%2Fsillycode.tech%2Fdashboard&response_type=code&scope=identify%20guilds";}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("body",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"logoNav",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.a,{href:"index",whileHover:{scale:1.1},whileTap:{scale:0.9},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"round",alt:"",src:logo,width:"150px",height:"150px"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.button,{whileHover:{scale:1.1},whileTap:{scale:0.9},className:"indexBtn",id:"loginButton",onClick:loginclick,children:"Login"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("main",{id:"content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"middle",children:"Nothing to Display. Please Login."})})]});}function load(){if(window.location.href.toString()!=url){//get the url
var _url=document.URL;//split the url in the terms we need
var split=_url.split("=");var split2=split[1].split("&");var split3=split[2].split("&");//order the tokens their content
token_type=split2[0];access_token=split3[0];//go with the token and token type to the Discordapi
fetch('https://discord.com/api/users/@me',{headers:{authorization:"".concat(token_type," ").concat(access_token)}}).then(function(result){return result.json();}).then(function(response){//give the build controller the data from the Api after asking for a cookie
buildController(response);}).catch(console.error);}else{//write that we are not able to use the dashboard because we are loged in
document.getElementById("content").innerHTML="Login to use the Dashboard";document.getElementById("content").className="middle";}}function buildController(response){//collect the things we become from the api
var id=response.id,username=response.username,avatar=response.avatar,discriminator=response.discriminator;//clear content
clearContent();//Start to build the ui
document.querySelector("body").innerText="Welcome "+username+" #"+discriminator+" to our Dashboard which is not avaible at the Moment.";}function clearContent(){document.querySelector("nav").remove();document.querySelector("main").remove();document.querySelector("br").remove();}export default Dashboard;
